text: Nganigawa masengo genu kwajongola wanganyao, nambo kuti Allah ni jwaakunâ€™jongolaga jwansachile. Sano mu chambone chilichose chachintole basi (ukoto wakwe) wenu mwachimisyene, ni ngankutolaga ikaweje pakusachilila Ngope ja Allah, sano mu chambone chilichose chachintole, chichilipidwa kukwenu mwakwanila, soni wanganyammwe ngasin'ja kutendedwa lupuso
